title: Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes
summary: The Scheduled Castes[2] (SCs) and Scheduled Tribes (STs) are officially designated groups of people and among the most disadvantaged socio-economic groups in India.[3] The terms are recognized in the Constitution of India and the groups are designated in one or other of the categories.[4]: 3  For much of the period of British rule in the Indian subcontinent, they were known as the Depressed Classes.[4]: 2
